data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,272,552 who are far from you in Chon Buri, Thailand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chon Buri, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 8,337 believers in Chon Buri, Thailand to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Chon Buri, Thailand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Chon Buri, Thailand from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Thai, Tak Bai people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Thai, Tak Bai people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Thai, Tak Bai people is yours.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Chon Buri to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Chon Buri, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Chon Buri, Thailand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
